title: "Coronavirus Update: New AI Diagnostic Tool Can Predict COVID-19 Even Without Testing"
excerpt: "The AI model uses information from the coronavirus symptom study app to predict COVID-19 by comparing the symptoms exhibited by people with the results of traditional testing methods. This method can be of great help in countries where access to testing is limited."
